articles.title: Nova Scotia: Four missing after extreme rainfall hits Canada - BBC
articles.description: The Canadian province of Nova Scotia is experiencing its heaviest rain in half a century.
articles.content:
Four people in Canada, including two children, have been reported missing in flooding caused by torrential rains in Nova Scotia, police have said.

articles.title: What Is "Sundowning" And Why Does It Happen To Many People With Dementia? - IFLScience
articles.description: People living with dementia often become more confused in the late afternoon and into the night. Why, and what can we do about it?
articles.content:
The term sundowning is sometimes used to describe a tendency for people living with dementia to become more confused in the late afternoon and into the night.
